title: Value Archaeology Study
setup: Computational analysis of 5 genetic selection platforms using systematic content analysis framework. Analysis dimensions: trait categorization, interface language, default settings. Bias scoring on 0-30 scale.
results: Hypothesis SUPPORTED. 100% of platforms showed embedded values (exceeds 80% criterion). Average bias score: 12.0/30. Systematic patterns: Medical model bias (60%), Enhancement orientation (40%), Value-loaded language (60%). Evidence that genetic selection technologies are value-embedded rather than neutral tools.
notes: Successfully validates Assumption 3 about technology neutrality. Provides empirical evidence for assumption inversion methodology. Methodology can be scaled to larger platform samples.
